import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from "react"; import "./style.css"; export default function Index(props) { const [timkiem, setTimkiem] = useState(""); const [showSearch, setShowSearch] = useState(false); const ref = useRef(null); useEffect(() => { /** * Alert if clicked on outside of element */ function handleClickOutside(event) { if (ref.current && !ref.current.contains(event.target)) { alert("You clicked outside of me!"); setShowSearch(false); } } // Bind the event listener document.addEventListener("mousedown", handleClickOutside); return () => { // Unbind the event listener on clean up document.removeEventListener("mousedown", handleClickOutside); }; }, [ref]); return (
{ this.setState({ showSearch: true, timkiem: e.target.value }); }} />
this.setState({ showSearch: false })} >
